title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.2 - Director; deputy chair; administrative law judge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.2 - Director; deputy chair; administrative law judge

State Regulations

The term
director, as used in this Chapter, shall mean the agent of the board designated as director of public employment
practices and representation; the term
deputy chair
shall mean
an agent of the board so designated; the term
administrative law
judge
as used in this Chapter shall mean an agent of the board so
designated and shall include the director and assistant director of public
employment practices and representation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
200.2

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
